summary: This is an email from Nicole Simmons transmitting an unredacted version of a legal filing in the cases US v. Maxwell Case No. 20-2413 and US v. Maxwell Case No. 20-3061. The email serves as a cover note for the attached document, which is a response to the government's opposition to a motion to consolidate.

persons.name: Nicole Simmons
persons.context: Sender of the email transmitting an unredacted legal filing in the Ghislaine Maxwell cases.

events.title: Filing of Unredacted Response in Maxwell Cases
events.description: An unredacted version of a document titled 'Response to Govt Opp to Mot to Consolidate' is filed in the appellate cases US v. Maxwell 20-2413 and 20-3061.

keyFacts: The document is an email cover note for an unredacted legal filing in the Ghislaine Maxwell appellate cases.
The attached filing is a 'Response to Govt Opp to Mot to Consolidate', indicating ongoing legal proceedings regarding case consolidation.
The correspondence originates from a law firm or legal professional in Denver, Colorado (hmflaw.com).
The email confirms the filing of an unredacted version of a document on September 23, 2020.
